version_description: - Added TV series section (dependent on provider)
- Fixed issue with EPG not loading for some providers
- Fixed issue with some VOD content not working or playing the wrong content
- Fixed issue with connecting to some portals due to old firmware
- Added ability to search and display subtitles for VOD

- Added ability to sort channels by name
- Added ability to change audio tracks in player (if available)
- Added ability to enter the full MAC address when adding/editing profiles
- Fixed issue with channels and EPG not loading for some portals

- Added ability to change aspect ratio in player
- Fixed issue with VOD not working for some portals
- Fixed a crash displaying audio tracks when there are none

- Added ability to go to the next/previous channel by swiping up/down on player
- Added Turkish language support

- Added ability to select soft coded subtitles for VOD (if available)
- Added confirmation dialog before deleting a profile
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some portals
- Fixed an issue with VOD not working for some portals

- Added displaying of expiry date (dependent on provider)
- Increased touch area of more button for profiles
- Fixed issue with favorite channels sort order not persisting

- Added ability to double tap the navigation title to go to the main profile screen
- Fixed issue with expiry date not showing for some portals
- Fixed issue with device going to sleep while watching content

- Added ability to double tap the navigation title to go to the main profile screen
- Fixed issue with expiry date not showing for some portals
- Fixed issue with device going to sleep while watching content

- Added ability to sort Live TV genres and VOD categories
- Added grid mode when browsing VOD content
- Added displaying of more details for VOD content

- Added trailer button in VOD detail view
- Added automatically playing the next episode in a VOD series

- Added genres in VOD detail view
- Added ability to enable subtitles for Live TV (dependent on provider)
- Added 2 and 5 minute jump intervals for VOD

- Added displaying of the number of channels in a genre
- Increased hit area of buttons in player controls

- Fixed an issue with fast forwarding and seeking in VOD by adding a new video player
- Fixed an issue with channels not loading for some portals

Note: You can fallback to the old player from the settings page.

- Added ability to crop video to fill screen
- Added automatically playing of next catch up program from downloaded list for a date
- Added ability to hide Live TV genres
- Fixed issue with blurry text in videos
- Added ability to hide VOD categories
- Added rating in VOD detail view
- Added option to cast to TV (May not work with all providers. Requires VLC app to be installed and a Chromecast.)

- Added ability to search profiles
- Added channel numbers
- Added ability to switch by channel number from player controls
- Added ability to go back to last played content from player controls
- Quicker connecting to portals

- Added picture in picture for supported devices (iPad)
- Added MAC address format validation
- Fixed an issue with not being able to save advanced settings for a profile
- Improved error handling with steps to troubleshoot
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some portals
- Added radio section (dependent on provider)
- Updated players and fixed an issue with some videos not playing

- Added ability to favorite radio channels (dependent on provider)
- Added ability to select the number of hours of EPG to fetch
- Fixed issue with play button not restarting VOD after it has ended
- Fixed a rare issue where channels fail to load
- Improved error reporting and handling
- Fixed bug where some VOD content won't display the episodes in the series

- Added ability to see video and audio details from player controls. Tap more button -> Media Details.
- Added ability to set an EPG offset for a profile. Tap more button next to a profile -> Preferences.
- Added an indicator in the player when video is loading
- Updated player V1 library. Please report any issues via the app.
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some portals
- Fixed an issue with some streams not working
- Added a new player to fix an issue with some streams not playing. Try it out!
- Added ability to filter channels in a genre by favorites

- Added displaying of VOD progress
- Updated genres/categories sorting to pin "All" at the top after "Favorites"

- Added a History category in VOD to view a list of recently watched VOD content
- Added ability to enter a STB type in the advanced settings of a profile
- Added ability to delete entries from VOD history. Long press the entry to access the menu.
- Fixed an issue with connecting to portals due to user agent

- Added ability to select the default screen for a profile in profile preferences.
- Added logging in player to help in troubleshooting player issues
- Enabled hardware decoding by default in player 2. Can be disabled in app settings.
- Tweaked some buffer and cache settings
- Fixed an issue with URLs containing special characters not working in player 2
- Fixed an issue with the keyboard not hiding after tapping the search button

- Added ability to clear cached data for a profile - access from profile preferences
- Added going to full screen when rotating to landscape on iPhone
- Added improved logging for helping in troubleshooting
- Fixed issue with subtitles not scaling well when going full screen

- Added support for TV series for Xtream Codes
- Added displaying of more VOD details for Xtream Codes
- Added ability to stretch video to fill screen
- Fixed an issue with VOD not working for Xtream Codes

- Added the ability to choose a size for displaying external subtitles
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Xtream Codes portals
- Updated player 3 with some improvements

- Added TV series categories for Xtream Codes
- Added ability to choose preferred stream format for Xtream Codes

- Added version history
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals not ending with /c

- Added catch up for Xtream Codes (dependent on provider)
- Added filtering of channels with catch up
- Added sorting and hiding of TV series categories

- Added displaying of full description for catch up
- Added selecting/deselecting all items when managing genres and categories
- Fixed an issue with catch up not playing for some Stalker portals
- Added ability to favorite TV Series for Xtream Codes and some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals

- Added radio section for Xtream Codes
- Fixed an issue with VOD genre and director not showing in detail view for Xtream Codes

- Added ability to use a background image when connected to a profile
- Fixed an issue with TV series not playing for some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals

- Added remote M3U playlist support with Live TV & EPG (dependent on playlist)
- Added All genre in Live TV for Xtream Codes
- Added All category in VOD for Xtream Codes
- Added grouping of TV Series by season for Xtream Codes
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with EPG/catch up not working for some Xtream Codes portals

- Added new STB model types
- Updated player 2 & 3 libraries. Please report any issues via the app.
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with lists not loading after sometime for some Stalker portals

- Added ability to select a subtitle encoding
- Added ability to sort VOD

- Added new app background images and updated UI when an image is selected
- Added ability to sort TV Series
- Added ability to use a custom EPG URL for remote M3U playlists
- Added new STB model type
- Fixed an issue with EPG loading delay for remote M3U playlists

- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with Radio not working for some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with seeking not working for some videos on player 2
- Fixed an occasional crash in player 1
- Fixed an issue with video not playing for some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with loading large remote M3U playlists

- Added ability to backup profiles to iCloud - access from app preferences
- Added ability to pause Live TV for players 2 & 3
- Added ability to set a hw_version for Stalker portals - access from profile advanced settings
- Added support for url-tvg EPG URL in M3U remote playlists

- Fixed an issue with VOD not playing for some Stalker portals
- Fixed an issue with subtitle tracks not showing for some streams in player 2

- Added ability to set Live TV reminders - access from EPG
- Added ability to retry playback on error - enable from player preferences
- Fixed an issue with some genres not showing all channels

- Added ability to filter VOD by genre for Stalker portals (dependent on provider)
- Added ability to get advanced settings from another device for Stalker portals - access by tapping the more button of a profile -> Edit -> Advanced

- Added more time intervals for EPG offset in profile preferences
- Fixed an issue with subtitles disappearing too soon in player 3
- Fixed an issue with subtitles appearing too big in player 3
- Fixed some UI bugs

- Added ability to search all content in a profile. Access from main profile page.
- Added ability to use a specific player for a profile. Access from profile preferences.

- Added ability to search all Live TV & VOD content in a profile group - access from main profile page
- Added ability to enter a custom value for HW Version in the advanced settings of a Stalker profile
- Updated backing up profiles using iCloud to include favorites & history
- Fixed an issue with parsing some remote M3U playlists

- Added VOD & catch up title in player controls
- Added volume control in player - pan vertically on the right edge
- Added displaying of number of items in VOD & TV series categories
- Added ability to use subtitles from provider for Stalker portals
- Added ability to clear cached data for all profiles - access from app preferences
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Xtream Codes portals
- Fixed an issue with subtitles screen opening behind video when in fullscreen
- Potentially fixed an issue with stream stopping after some time when opening in VLC

- Added displaying of expiry date for remote M3U playlists (dependent on provider)
- Added All category in TV Series for Xtream Codes (dependent on provider)
- Added help center
- Added feedback when subtitles cannot be downloaded from OpenSubtitles
- Updated to automatically open last viewed channel only if the default section in the profile is Live TV
- Updated handling of errors during playback - enable retry playback on error from player preferences   
- Updated player 3 library
- Fixed an issue with connecting to some Stalker portals
- Removed displaying of number of items in VOD & TV series categories

- Added using of encoding from OpenSubtitles and subtitle encoding detection
- Added ability to auto-load subtitles from provider - access from subtitle preferences
- Updated OpenSubtitles search to only display supported subtitles
- Fixed an issue with next episode not automatically playing for some TV series
- Fixed an issue with loading some external subtitles
- Removed scrolling animation when opening channel list

- Added remembering of last selected aspect ratio and crop mode
- Fixed issues with loading large EPGs for remote M3U profiles
- Fixed missingIndex error when downloading subtitles

- Added history category for TV Series
- Added auto loading of subtitles from provider for Live TV - enable from subtitle preferences
- Removed retry playback on error limit for Live TV
- Fixed an issue with player 3 video freezing when scrolling lists
- Fixed an issue with getting settings from another device not working
- Fixed an issue with EPG not showing for duplicate items in M3U remote playlists

- Added ability to reorder favorite channels - access from favorites channel list
- Added displaying of next program in channel list
- Added ability to set a user agent for the player in profiles - access from profile preferences
- Added ability to cancel loading a profile
- Added new STB model types
- Fixed an issue with the aspect ratio not changing on player 3
- Fixed an issue with the channel list not automatically scrolling to the selected channel
- Fixed a memory leak

- Added Multi View to view multiple streams at once - access from player controls (dependent on provider)
- Added support for catch up in remote M3U playlists using Flussonic (dependent on provider)
- Added ability to enter advanced settings when adding Stalker profiles
- Added ability to copy video URL - access from player controls
- Added displaying of number of active connections for Xtream Codes & remote M3U playlists (dependent on provider)
- Updated all players
- Updated players to retry playback on error by default
- Fixed an issue with EPG for previous day not showing for remote M3U playlists
- Fixed some UI issues and made some UI improvements

- Added displaying of recently viewed Live TV & VOD
- Updated channel list to show progress of current program
- Updated Live TV to display channel numbers from provider (dependent on provider)
